Quality and satisfaction of customers is our first priority.


Our journey towards achieving success and excellence began back in 1980 when the owners decided to be one of the very first crankshaft manufacturing companies in Rajkot, Gujarat and now with experience of over 38 years in the field of manufacturing crankshafts, the company is guided by adept and very professional directors.


We started our journey by manufacturing Lister type crankshaft. After acquiring enough experience in the same discipline we then indulged ourselves into manufacturing of multitudinous crankshafts such as Petter oil engine and Lombardini crankshaft.


The company manufactures fully finished and semi-finished steel forged as well as cast iron crankshafts. Along with key Original Equipment Manufacturers, we have developed extensive range of crankshafts which has application in sectors such as Agriculture, Power Generation, Automobile and Earth moving equipment. To ensure accuracy, we manufacture all the crankshafts precisely according to O.E. specifications and on CNC lines adapting state of the art technology.


It is through years of rigorous efforts that we learned and made progress. It is the customers who made us stronger and more confident. We fully assure that we make progress by bringing in the latest technological advancements. With strong foot hold, the company works with even more conviction and determination.

In order to adhere to stringent quality control measures highly accurate instruments of renowned make are used during manufacturing process. We provide a list of exhaustive measuring equipment used by us in manufacturing facility such as Micrometer, Digital Vernier Caliper, Snap Gauge, Slip Gauge, Digital Master Height Gauge.


Further to satisfy our customer needs, various reports like metallurgical testing comprising chemical composition as well as micro-structure together with Millipore report are periodically done through NABL approved agencies.
